findings: No data-test attributes found on any of the 69 interactive elements
No console logging detected during page load
recommendations: Add data-testid attributes to buttons, links, and form inputs
Implement structured logging for user actions and state changes
recommendations.recommendation: **Findings:** No data-test attributes found on any of the 69 interactive elements; No console logging detected during page load. **Actions:** Add data-testid attributes to buttons, links, and form inputs; Implement structured logging for user actions and state changes.

findings: No test automation attributes found (checked 6 inputs, 2 buttons across 2 forms)
2 forms found but lacking automation attributes
recommendations: Add data-testid or data-automation attributes to enable programmatic control
Add unique identifiers to form fields for reliable test automation
recommendations.recommendation: **Findings:** No test automation attributes found (checked 6 inputs, 2 buttons across 2 forms); 2 forms found but lacking automation attributes. **Actions:** Add data-testid or data-automation attributes to enable programmatic control; Add unique identifiers to form fields for reliable test automation.

findings: High interaction complexity detected (average 5.0 steps per workflow)
Multi-step processes found requiring 15 total steps
recommendations: Simplify user workflows by reducing required steps
Consider consolidating steps or providing skip/fast-path options
recommendations.recommendation: **Findings:** High interaction complexity detected (average 5.0 steps per workflow); Multi-step processes found requiring 15 total steps. **Actions:** Simplify user workflows by reducing required steps; Consider consolidating steps or providing skip/fast-path options.

findings: No data attributes found to expose component state or structure
Only 9 elements have semantic class names
recommendations: Add data-* attributes to expose component identity and state for testing
Use descriptive class names that reveal component purpose (e.g., .navigation, .submit-button)
Add data-debug or data-id attributes to aid debugging and test identification
recommendations.recommendation: **Findings:** No data attributes found to expose component state or structure; Only 9 elements have semantic class names; No debugging attributes detected. **Actions:** Add data-* attributes to expose component identity and state for testing; Use descriptive class names that reveal component purpose (e.g., .navigation, .submit-button); Add data-debug or data-id attributes to aid debugging and test identification.

findings: No tooltips or guidance elements detected
recommendations: Implement data-tooltip attributes or .tooltip elements for user guidance
recommendations.recommendation: **Findings:** No tooltips or guidance elements detected. **Actions:** Implement data-tooltip attributes or .tooltip elements for user guidance.

findings: No version information detected in page structure
recommendations: Add data-version or meta tags to expose application version for test compatibility tracking
recommendations.recommendation: **Findings:** No version information detected in page structure. **Actions:** Add data-version or meta tags to expose application version for test compatibility tracking.

recommendations: Refactor monolithic pages into testable components with clear boundaries
recommendations.recommendation: **Findings:** No components identified in markup. **Actions:** Refactor monolithic pages into testable components with clear boundaries.
